name: Journey of the Slayer
description:
Journey of the Slayer is a roguelike turn based isometric strategy game where you kill demons to protect human villages. In every level, if you protected the village, you get a new item. Purpose of the game is passing as many levels as possible.

This is an open source project. Repository is here:

https://github.com/SUKRUCIRIS/Journey-of-the-Slayer

My website:

https://sukruciris.github.io
